articles.content: Discord will soon start incorporating ads into its free in-game chat and streaming software, despite the fact the company has long said it didn't want to rely on ads for revenue like other social med… [+2146 chars]

articles.author: Jeanette Settembre
articles.title: New Yorkers dishing out as much as $3,750 on private jets to see solar eclipse above the clouds — then come back home - New York Post
articles.description: ‘I’m splurging on myself for this one,’ said one New Yorker who is spending large to guarantee seeing a solar eclipse with a view from above the clouds.
articles.content:
As the moon passes between the Earth and the sun Monday, Andrew Bazos will be cruising at 17,000 feet, rosé in hand, having dropped $2,000 to watch the solar eclipse from a private plane’s window.
